name: fullstack-app
description: Full-stack application with React frontend and FastAPI backend

scripts.dev: echo 'Use: cd frontend && npm run dev for frontend, cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload for backend'
scripts.install:backend: cd backend && python3 -m venv venv && source venv/bin/activate && pip install -r requirements.txt
scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && uvicorn app.main:app --reload
scripts.setup: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend && echo 'Setup complete! Check README.md for usage instructions.'
scripts.migrate: cd backend && source venv/bin/activate && alembic upgrade head
